name: Kitty Moon
description:
Pink Dinosaur team proudly presents Kitty Moon! Introduction

"This story begins when a race of cats wanted to conquer the universe. They were called Kittymoon. A huge amount of spaceships went across the whole universe, but we are going to focus on one, in particular, one manned by a small adventurer cat who decided to go as far as possible, with the objective of discovering all the secrets of the universe. On its journey, our hero met awesome places like galaxies, planets, black holes and wormholes… But after too much time travelling, our cat, whose name is “Chorizo”, wants to come back with its family. That desire has led our hero to the odyssey we are about to enter"

Controls:

Mouse: Select
